title: Colorations - LWPACK Liquid Watercolor Paint, 4 fl oz, Set of 6, Non-Toxic, Painting, Kids, Craft, Hobby, Fun, Water Color, Posters, Cool Effects, Versatile, Gift
description: Our most vibrant paint, in a convenient 4 oz. rainbow pack! Longer-lasting and more colorful than traditional watercolors, Liquid Watercolor is the economical choice with so many uses. Plus, Liquid Watercolor is easily washable from skin and most fabrics and surfaces! Set includes 4 oz. each of: red, orange, yellow, green, blue, and violet Convenient 4 oz. bottles are value priced and ideal for small groups Dazzling on paper, wood, fabric, canvas, and diffusing paper Use straight from the bottle for ultimate brilliance, or dilute with water for a traditional watercolor look Mixes beautifully into secondary colors Use with brushes, droppers and bingo bottles for different effects Mists from spray bottles Use to tint glue or dye dough, wood and sensory materials Paint over crayon drawings to create amazing resist art More washable and economical than food coloring for arts & crafts projects Made in the USA by Discount School Supply AP Certified - Discount School Supply Item # LWPACK.
